known_issues: Raw marks display showing percentages instead of actual numbers (e.g., 92% instead of 73)
Grade filtering by section and term not working properly
Grade calculation should use percentage thresholds (e.g., 85% = A) not grading system numbers

existing_features.title: Display raw marks as actual numbers (e.g., 73) instead of percentages (e.g., 92%) throughout the application
Enable filtering of grades by both section and term in the grades view
Fix 9-scale grading system calculation to work properly
Calculate letter grades (A, B, C, etc.) based on percentage thresholds (e.g., 85% = A grade) rather than using grading system numbers

projectName: Fix marks display, filtering, and grade calculation
